thread.title: Beam bum: Drugs mule Michaella McCollum goes near-nude in VERY skimpy bikini

title: Beam bum: Drugs mule Michaella McCollum goes near-nude in VERY skimpy bikini
text:
Beam bum: Drugs mule Michaella McCollum goes near-nude in VERY skimpy bikini Beam bum: Drugs mule Michaella McCollum goes near-nude in VERY skimpy bikini BRITISH drug smuggler Michaella McCollum went nearly-naked in a barely-there bikini while on holiday in Spain.   24-year-old has returned to Spain – where she hatched a botched plot to smuggle £1.5million of cocaine out of Spain four years ago. 
The leggy blonde was photographed frolicking in the sea and showering on the beach in Marbella. 
ICELEBTV TAN-TASTIC: Michaella McCollum flashes the flesh on the beach in Marbella 
ICELEBTV ITSY BITSY: The bikini left very little to the imagination 
McCollum, from County Tyrone, Northern Ireland, walked along the seafront in a floaty robe. 
But she quickly stripped down to a skimpy bathing suit to maximise her golden tan. 
ICELEBTV ALL BY MYSELF: McCollum cut a lonely figure as she wandered along the empty beac 
ICELEBTV COOL OFF: McCollum showered off on the beach “When one door closes, another opens” Michaella McCollum 
McCollum and pal Melissa Reid, from Scotland, became known as the “Peru Two” after they were convicted of trying to smuggle 11kg of coke out of the South American country. 
The Northern Irish lass was just 20 years old when she agreed to the deal, while working as a dancer in a bar in Ibiza. 
ICELEBTV DRESSING DOWN: McCollum walked to the beach in a dressing gown The hottest wanderlust babes on Instagram Tuesday, 15th November 2016 Whether sitting poolside in Ibiza, yachting off the Southern coast of Italy, or soaking in a hot tub in fabulous Palm Springs, these women get the best of the best from life. 1 / 43 Russian fitness model Viktoria Odintsova 
She cut a lonely figure, pottering around the beach on her own. 
But she smiled as she washed off the sand in the shower. 
ICELEBTV ALL WET: McCollum needs to dry off after her shower 
ICELEBTV RED HOT: McCollum's bum seems to have had a bit too much sun 
ICELEBTV GLOW: McCollum seemed to be enjoying her freedom 
McCollum – who was released on parole last March after serving less than half of her six-year sentence – has hinted that she has big plans for her future. 
Breaking her silence on Facebook earlier this month, McCollum said: “When one door closes, another opens.” The Only Way Is Marbs!! Sunday, 14th June 2015 TOWIE cast members Chloe Sims, Danielle Armstrong, Chloe Lewis, Jessica Wright and more have fun in the sun in Marbella while filming for The Only Way Is Marbs. 1 / 73 TGB / Splash News Georgia Kousoulou, Jake Hall and Chloe Lewis seen filming this afternoon La Cabane in Marbella. 
She thanked her friends and family for their support, saying: “It has been a long ride to get where I am today but it just shows that when we fight hard enough for something we can achieve it.” Related articles
